name: Hot Reactor
description:
The reactor is about to explode!! You must go down stars to fix that and save the city!

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Space bar to jump.
  • Enter to interact.

Credits:

  • Made with Godot Engine.
  • Graphics with Paint.net
  • Sounds with Bfxr
  • Music: Jorge Hernandez - Chopsticks / Joshua McLean - Mountain Trials / Messeah - RoccoW
